69b0d3dfe919a6b860a9fac82de52a7e (07:07): .ch is switzerland
69b0d3dfe919a6b860a9fac82de52a7e (07:07): i'm swiss
69b0d3dfe919a6b860a9fac82de52a7e (07:07): (half swiss)
353fa4cc248867e98de9cab7d122c320 (07:07): 69b0d3dfe919a6b860a9fac82de52a7e: are you swi or iss ?
8fc019e59244da41feafed752bc36331 (07:08): I mean, I knew that .ch is Switzerland, but didn't know you've actually some physical connection into it
69b0d3dfe919a6b860a9fac82de52a7e (07:08): 353fa4cc248867e98de9cab7d122c320: i cut it horizontally, top half
69b0d3dfe919a6b860a9fac82de52a7e (07:08): 8fc019e59244da41feafed752bc36331: yup born there. not far from cern, actually. left around the time tim was coming up with the idea for the web though. :-)
8fc019e59244da41feafed752bc36331 (07:09): he he - a sign!
8fc019e59244da41feafed752bc36331 (07:09): so you speak French?
69b0d3dfe919a6b860a9fac82de52a7e (07:09): about as well as a ten year old, but yeah
8fc019e59244da41feafed752bc36331 (07:10): reason being we have three children (youngest 4) and their German is getting worse and worse (we moved over to Ireland in 2009)
8fc019e59244da41feafed752bc36331 (07:10): so I'm always wondering what other people have experienced in that respect as I don't have any other references
8fc019e59244da41feafed752bc36331 (07:12): (well, besides my sister who lives in Norway, she has two children but their language mix is even worse - German, Dutch, English and now Norwegian ;)
69b0d3dfe919a6b860a9fac82de52a7e (07:13): dunno what to tell you
69b0d3dfe919a6b860a9fac82de52a7e (07:13): it's all about practicing
69b0d3dfe919a6b860a9fac82de52a7e (07:13): my written french is atrocious
69b0d3dfe919a6b860a9fac82de52a7e (07:14): and my vocab completely lacks any computer terminology
69b0d3dfe919a6b860a9fac82de52a7e (07:14): but i think if i went to live in a french speaking area i'd get back up to speed relatively quickly
8fc019e59244da41feafed752bc36331 (07:14): fair enough, guess English is appropriate there to fill in the blanks
8fc019e59244da41feafed752bc36331 (07:14): if there is a basis, the missing vocabs come over time
